mapper.insert:
insert into mall_wms.wms_ware_sku(sku_id, ware_id, stock, sku_name, stock_locked) values
(#{entity.skuId}, #{entity.wareId}, #{entity.stock}, #{entity.skuName}, #{entity.stockLocked})

insert into mall_wms.wms_ware_sku(sku_id, ware_id, stock, sku_name, stock_locked) values
(#{entity.skuId}, #{entity.wareId}, #{entity.stock}, #{entity.skuName}, #{entity.stockLocked})
on duplicate key update sku_id = values(sku_id) , ware_id = values(ware_id) , stock = values(stock) , sku_name = values(sku_name) , stock_locked = values(stock_locked)
